4.zh: 新增置换VITE功能，用户可以将ERC20 VITE代币置换到VITE网络中，置换后的VITE可进行投票赚取奖励，年化收益达20%
4.en: There has added a function of VITE migration. You can transfer your VITE ERC 20 tokens to Vite Network and vote for SBP. Annual earning of voting reaches 20%

3.zh:
1. 新增账户地址复制按钮
2. 可选使用12个助记词
3. 交易列表新增交易类型
4. 提供一键恢复注册SBP
3.en:
1. Address copy button newly added
2. 12 mnenomic words option newly added
3. Transaction type newly added in transaction list
4. SBP registration one-key recovery newly added

2.zh:
1. 新增注册SBP（Snapshot Block Producer）功能
2. 新增投票选举SBP功能
2.en:
1. Registration for SBP(Snapshot Block Producer) function newly added.
2. Vote for SBP function newly added.
